plot outline: Raghunath Ghosh has a troubled past in his childhood which forces him in Juvenile delinquency. After his release a grown and changed man now,raghunath tries to make his life after detention but what will he do when he is faced with circumstances forcing him again to take a path of crime.
title: Amanush 2
plot: A man struggles to stay on the straight and narrow after a troubled childhood and a stint in juvenile detention.
